typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	timeout: 30,
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> rest
rest foldDown(unroll(),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten
